original_title: Doctor, You've Got to Be Kidding!
overview: In this comedy, an aspiring singer finds herself single and pregnant. The story begins when she is rushed to the hospital to give birth. She is joined by three men; all of them want to marry her. The story of her pregnancy and her rise to stardom are told in flashback.
tagline: She Has to Choose a Husband in a Hurry!
title: Doctor, You've Got to Be Kidding!
